articles.title: Indian ADRs: Tata Motors gains 2%, ICICI Bank, Dr Reddy#39;s Lab up
articles.description: Indian ADRs ended mostly higher on Friday. Dr Reddy#39;s Laboratories gained 1.51 percent and Infosys rose 0.24 percent at USD 20.85.
articles.content: Indian ADRs ended mostly higher on Friday. In the IT space, Infosys rose 0.24 percent at USD 20.85, while Wipro was down 0.75 percent at USD 5.30. In the banking space, ICICI Bank added 1.20 percent at USD 9.24, while HDFC Bank shed 0.11 percent at USD 98.16.… [+127 chars]

articles.title: The Fertility Clinic That Cut IVF Prices in Half
articles.description: The doctor in charge says he opens the door to more families. He says yes to patients considered too old or obese elsewhere.

articles.title: CPM declines to join Telangana TDP’s proposed grand alliance
articles.description: The CPM — which had formed the Left Bahujan Front on January 25 comprising 31 social organisations — told T-TDP on Monday that it had decided not to join the alliance.
articles.content: The T-TDP, with the tacit blessing of TDP chief N Chandrababu Naidu, is ready to tie up with the Congress. (File) The proposed ‘Mahakutami’ (grand alliance) that the Telangana unit of Telugu Desam Party (T-TDP) is trying to stitch with the Congress, CPI, CPM … [+4107 chars]

articles.title: Podcast | Stock picks of the day: Use rallies towards 11,600-11,650 to initiate shorts on Nifty
articles.description: On the higher side, call writing at 11,700-11,800 will act as stiff resistance zone for the index and a close above 11,800 will only negate bearish view on indices.
articles.content: Aditya Agarwal The mounting concern of falling Indian Rupee (INR) against the US Dollar along with the rising bond yields put tremendous pressure on Indices. As a result, Nifty nosedived sharply this week and slipped below 11,400-mark in Wednesday’s session. … [+3555 chars]
